Reviews.Title: best phone ever
Reviews.Author: victorb
Reviews.Content: At first I was a little worried that the phone would betoo small for me but I didn't want a big phone so I went with this anyway and it's actually perfect! It doesn't lagg, the camera is great for taking pictures and videos of my grandkids although I still have yet to learn how to upload them to the internet it's great for me! I love this phone and absolutely give it my recomondation

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Felipe E.
Reviews.Content: I needed an unlocked phone to upgrade my old Nokia (7 years old) without changing my current plan. I removed the micro card from my old cell and installed in the new Galaxy Ace S5831...everything is working perfectly in my new smartphone.

Reviews.Title: minimum smart phone - good price, but....
Reviews.Author: France R.
Reviews.Content: no back camera, poor front camera, slow, the minimum.  however, it is unlocked and it is a smartphone.  there are others, albeit without the brand name, though, that far exceed the capabilities of this one.

Reviews.Title: Small but efficient
Reviews.Author: quin n.
Reviews.Content: Small but okay does what I expect it to do. Cases are not easy to find in the US. Nice features.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: eli
Reviews.Content: WORKS GOOD, ITS THE SAME IN THE PICTURE I LIKE A LOT MY NEW PHONE HAVE I FEW FEATURES THEN I LOVE. WAS A GREAT PURSHACE.

Reviews.Title: Worst cell i've had
Reviews.Author: D.R.C.
Reviews.Content: The worst cellphone i have had, is too laggy and slow, i cant even use whatsapp like i should, i have to delete all the call logs so that the internal memory gets some space and the cell doesnt start crashing whenever i open an app. I'm going to give away this cell and buy an iphone.
